# isLeaf

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the receiver is a leaf node.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLeaf: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is a leaf node (has no child nodes), otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Getting information about a node

- **representedObject**: The object the tree node represents.
- **indexPath**: The position of the receiver relative to its root parent.
- **children**: An array containing receiver’s child nodes.
- **mutableChildren**: A mutable array that provides read-write access to the receiver’s child nodes.
- **descendant(at:)**: Returns the receiver’s descendant at the specified index path.
- **parent**: The receiver’s parent node.
